body:
Hello Guys!
I have decided to make minecraft skins for Avicus Players!



Rules:
* No asking when your skin will be done
* The amount of skins I make in a week may change.




I am also recruiting people to work with me.
Requirements:
* You must know how to properly gradient
* You must be active on making skins





Template for Requesting a Skin:
IGN:
Why you want a new skin:
Details, Specifications (VERY DETAILED):
Any templates you want me to use:





Manager: X_Heat
Employee 1: jojobloblo
Employee 2: Evocal
Employee 3: DaBaderMC



These are some skins I have made:
body_tagged:

These are some skins I have made:
title: Skin Factory v1.0 [Minecraft Skins]

replies.body:
IGN: Voltdrive
Why you want a new skin: Because my current one sucks, and I can't find one I really love.
Details, Specifications (VERY DETAILED): Basically, a robotic blaze. Do whatever you can to make myself look cybernetic, but still keep some original blaze parts on. Besides that, don't care what you do.
Any templates you want me to use: No.

replies.body:
IGN: diamondporkchop3
Why you want a new skin: Because my skin is really overused and there are many different versions.
Details: Specifications (Very Detailed): A diamond pig. Not diamond ore, like diamond blocks. Also make sure there are no "nipples" on the pig's stomach. Also, a pair of headphones with a mic on the head. Please make sure you include a tail.
Thanks you.
~Diamondporkchop3
replies.body_tagged:
